P0420.title: Catalyst System Efficiency Below Threshold
P0420.desc: Very common on i-VTEC engines; often due to O2 sensor aging or lean trims.

P0171.title: System Too Lean (Bank 1)
P0171.desc: Frequent on Civics and Jazz; intake leaks or PCV valve issues.

P2646.title: VTEC Oil Pressure Switch Circuit Low Voltage
P2646.desc: Low oil pressure or solenoid/switch fault in VTEC system.

P0301.title: Cylinder 1 Misfire
P0301.desc: Often coil or plug related on R18/K20 engines.
